abstract: The German automaker’s volume leader is fitted for 2012 with the twin-scroll turbocharged 4-cylinder that appears in the Z4 sDrive 28i, as well as a new 8-speed automatic transmission.
snippet: The German automaker’s volume leader is fitted for 2012 with the twin-scroll turbocharged 4-cylinder that appears in the Z4 sDrive 28i, as well as a new 8-speed automatic transmission.

headline.main: Wider, Wedgier BMW 3 Series Gets a 4-Cylinder Engine for 2012
